channel.title: 2008 on CAMGDP: Central Asia and Mongolia Gender Data Portal
channel.description: Recent content in 2008 on CAMGDP: Central Asia and Mongolia Gender Data Portal

item.title: Legal Policy Research Center
item.description: Founded in 2008 by a group of Kazakhstani lawyers, Legal Policy Research Center (LPRC) is a non-political, independent research institute promoting the principle of the rule of law and liberal values through the implementation of research, publishing and educational activities in the field of legal policy. Its mission is to strengthen democratic values through effective legal reforms. Its projects include promoting anti-discrimination agenda and combating sexual harassment.

item.title: TAG news
item.description: Founded first in 2008 in Kazakhstan, TAG news agency offers coverage of current events in Kazakhstan, Kyrgyzstan, Tajikistan, Afghanistan, Iran, and the Silk Road region. Available in English, Kazakh, and Russian in Kazakhstan; Kyrgyz and Russian in Kyrgyzstan; Uzbek and Russian in Uzbekistan; and Tajik and Russian in Tajikistan.
